question.title: Maximum Size Subarray Sum Equals k
question.translatedTitle: 和等于 k 的最长子数组长度

hints: Try to compute a sum of a subsequence very fast, i.e in O(1) … Think of prefix sum array.
Given S[i] a partial sum that starts at position 0 and ends at i, what can S[i - k] tell you ?
